info.title: FNF: Switch Funkin'
info.author: Slushi
info.description: Real FNF' for Nintendo Switch, why not?
info.details:
Enjoy the Psych Engine 1.0.4 experience on your Nintendo Switch!

You must always open the game from an official game (usually by holding the R button while launching a game from the HOME menu).

Installing mods:

Installing mods on Switch Funkin' is easy. Once you open the game at least once, on your SD card, inside the "switch" folder, you will see a new folder called "Switch-Funkin" Inside it, you will find the “mods” folder, which works exactly the same as normal Psych Engine.

changelog: FIxes:\n- The way to check if the current version is really old has been corrected (I forgot to upload the changes to GitHub).\n- Fixed an issue that prevented mods from being disabled.
